string.rus:

%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 02:%c[255,1,255,1] А. Розенбаум: Гоп-стоп

%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 04:%c[255,1,255,1] Розенбаум: Вальс-бостон 
%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 05:%c[255,1,255,1] Scorpions: Holideys 
%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 06:%c[255,1,255,1] БИ2: Мой рок-н рол 
%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 07:%c[255,1,255,1] Несчастный Случай: Песня без названия 
%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 08:%c[255,1,255,1] ДДТ: Ленинград 
%c[255,1,255,255]ТРЕК 09:%c[255,1,255,1] Гимн Прапорщиков

string.eng:
Flash cards with musical tracks for MP-3 player. 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 01:%c[255,1,255,1] Lyube: Dusya agregat 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 02:%c[255,1,255,1] Alexander Rosenbaum: Rip-Off 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 03:%c[255,1,255,1] Mikhail Krug: Vladimirskiy tsentral 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 04:%c[255,1,255,1] Alexander Rosenbaum: Boston 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 05:%c[255,1,255,1] Scorpions: Holideys 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 06:%c[255,1,255,1] BI2: My rock-n-roll 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 07:%c[255,1,255,1] Neschastny Sluchai: Unnamed song 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 08:%c[255,1,255,1] DDT: Leningrad 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 09:%c[255,1,255,1] Warrant officers hymn 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 10:%c[255,1,255,1] Kukryniksy: The star 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 11:%c[255,1,255,1] A. Makarevish: Only birds sing for free 
%c[255,1,255,255]Track 12:%c[255,1,255,1] Chaif: From war
